problem_text_cn: 如图,某货船以24海里/时的速度从A处向正东方向的D处航行,在点A处测得某岛C在北偏东60°的方向．该货船航行30分钟后到达B处,此时测得该岛在北偏东30°的方向上．则货船在航行中离小岛C的最短距离是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a cargo ship sails from point A to point D in the east direction at a speed of N_0 nautical mile/hour. At point A, a certain island C is measured in the direction N_1 east by north. The cargo ship arrived at point B after sailing for N_2 minutes. At this time, it was measured that the island is in the direction N_3 east by north. Then the shortest distance between the cargo ship and the island C is ()
raw_answer: 解:作CE⊥AB交AB的延长线于E,由题意得,AB=24×\frac{1}{2}=12,∠CBE=60°,∠CAE=30°,∴∠ACB=30°,∴∠CAE=∠ACB,∴BC=AB=12,在Rt△CBE中,sin∠CBE=\frac{CE}{BC},∴CE=BC×sin∠CBE=12×\frac{√{3}}{2}=6√{3}(海里),故选:B．
